# BtcTurk | Kripto API Documentation

## BtcTurk | Kripto API Documentation

- [General Information](https://docs.btcturk.com/master)
- [API Access Permissions](https://docs.btcturk.com/api-access-permissions)
- [Data Center](https://docs.btcturk.com/data-center)
- [Recent changes](https://docs.btcturk.com/recent-changes): Information about recent changes. Recent changes can be followed on this page.
- [Authentication V1](https://docs.btcturk.com/authentication/authentication-v1)
- [Usage](https://docs.btcturk.com/authentication/usage)
- [All Public Endpoints](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/all-public-endpoints)
- [Get Exchange Info](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/exchange-info)
- [Get Tickers](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/ticker)
- [Get OrderBook](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/orderbook)
- [Get Trades](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/trades)
- [Get OHLC Data](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/ohcl-data)
- [Get Kline Data](https://docs.btcturk.com/public-endpoints/get-kline-data)
- [All Private Endpoints](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/all-private-endpoints)
- [Get Account Balance](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/account-balance)
- [Get User Transactions](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/user-transactions)
- [Get Fiat Transactions](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/get-fiat-transactions)
- [Get Crypto Transactions](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/get-crypto-transactions)
- [Get Open Orders](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/open-orders)
- [Get All Orders](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/all-orders)
- [Get Single Order](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/get-single-order)
- [Submit an Order](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/submit-order)
- [Cancel an Order](https://docs.btcturk.com/private-endpoints/cancel-order)
- [Rate Limits](https://docs.btcturk.com/rate-limits)
- [WebSocket Authentication](https://docs.btcturk.com/websocket-feed/authentication)
- [Channel, Event and Model](https://docs.btcturk.com/websocket-feed/channel-event-and-model)
- [Models](https://docs.btcturk.com/websocket-feed/models)
- [TradingView](https://docs.btcturk.com/websocket-feed/tradingview)
- [Errors](https://docs.btcturk.com/errors)
- [Error Handling For Order Operations](https://docs.btcturk.com/error-handling-for-order-operations)
- [Retry Strategy Guideline](https://docs.btcturk.com/error-handling-for-order-operations/retry-strategy-guideline)
- [Pairs Scale (Quantity/Price)](https://docs.btcturk.com/pairs-scale-quantity-price)
- [FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)](https://docs.btcturk.com/faq-frequently-asked-questions)
- [Contact Us](https://docs.btcturk.com/contact-us)
